content:
1. I am a 25-year-old woman.
2. I have a good understanding of sexual lubricants and their benefits and have used them before.
3. Yes, I have used lubricant before, I have tried a few different brands, my current favorite is Sliquid. I chose it because it's organic and safe to use with condoms and toys.
4. I consider the ingredients, safety, and price when purchasing a lubricant.
5. Yes, I've seen advertisements for lubricants before, I find them informative and not too pushy.
6. Yes, I think lubricants are important for sexual experiences, they can make the experience more comfortable and enjoyable.
7. I am comfortable discussing and buying lubricants.
8. The advertisement didn't influence my opinion about the lubricant but it did make me aware of different types of lubricants available and the benefits of using them.
9. I would rate my overall satisfaction with the lubricant as 9 out of 10.
10. I would recommend the lubricant to my friends and family.
11. The advertisement was informative and persuasive, it highlighted the benefits of using lubricants during sexual experiences and made me want to try the product.
12. The advertisement reinforced my perception of the lubricant brand as a quality and reliable one.
13. The advertisement reinforced my belief that lubricants are important for sexual experiences.
14. The fact that the lubricant was organic and safe to use with condoms and toys stood out to me in the advertisement.
15. I would definitely consider trying the lubricant brand after watching the advertisement, it seemed like a high-quality product and I trust the brand.
